org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization

Class SerdesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.turbogwt.net.http.serialization.SerdesManager

  • public class SerdesManager
extends Object
    Manager for registering and retrieving Serializers and Deserializers.
    Author:
    Danilo Reinert

    • Method Detail

      • registerDeserializer

        public <T> org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration registerDeserializer(Class<T> type,
                                                           Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        Register a deserializer of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object to be deserialized.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the deserializer's type.
        deserializer - The deserializer of T.
        Returns:
        The Registration object, capable of cancelling this registration to the SerdesManager.

      • registerSerializer

        public <T> org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration registerSerializer(Class<T> type,
                                                         Serializer<T> serializer)
        Register a serializer of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object to be serialized.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the serializer's type.
        serializer - The serializer of T.
        Returns:
        The Registration object, capable of cancelling this registration to the SerdesManager.

      • registerSerdes

        public <T> org.turbogwt.core.util.Registration registerSerdes(Class<T> type,
                                                     Serdes<T> serdes)
        Register a serializer/deserializer of the given type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the object to be serialized/deserialized.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the serializer/deserializer's type.
        serdes - The serializer/deserializer of T.
        Returns:
        The Registration object, capable of cancelling this registration to the SerdesManager.

      • getDeserializer

        public <T> Deserializer<T> getDeserializer(Class<T> type,
                                  String contentType)
                                throws SerializationException
        Retrieve Deserializer from manager.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the deserializer.
        Parameters:
        type - The type class of the deserializer.
        Returns:
        The deserializer of the specified type.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if no deserializer was registered for the class.

      • getSerializer

        public <T> Serializer<T> getSerializer(Class<T> type,
                              String contentType)
                            throws SerializationException
        Retrieve Serializer from manager.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of the serializer.
        Parameters:
        type - The type class of the serializer.
        Returns:
        The serializer of the specified type.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if no serializer was registered for the class.
